00023 
00024 #include <vle/extension/DifferenceEquation.hpp>
00025 
00026 namespace Unit {
00027 
00028     class UnitLeafArea: public vle::extension::DifferenceEquation::Multiple
00029     {
00030     public:
00031         UnitLeafArea(const vle::devs::DynamicsInit& init,
00032               const vle::devs::InitEventList& events) :
00033         vle::extension::DifferenceEquation::Multiple(init, events)
00034         {
00035         // Variables d'etat gerees par ce composant UnitLeafArea
00036         RateAreaExpansion = createVar("RateAreaExpansion");
00037         RateAreaSenescence = createVar("RateAreaSenescence");       
00038         AreaExpansion = createVar("AreaExpansion");
00039         AreaSenescence = createVar("AreaSenescence");
00040         AreaActive = createVar("AreaActive");
00041         
00042         // Variables  gérées par un autre  composant
00043         TempEff = createSync("TempEff"); 
00044         ThermalTime = createSync("ThermalTime"); 
00045         
00046         // Lecture des parametres (certains deviendront des variables ensuite)
00047         // P_Phyllochron = vle::value::toDouble(events.get("P_Phyllochron"));
00048         P_AreaMax = vle::value::toDouble(events.get("P_AreaMax"));
00049         P_UnitTTExp = vle::value::toDouble(events.get("P_UnitTTExp"));
00050         P_UnitTTSen = vle::value::toDouble(events.get("P_UnitTTSen"));
00051         P_SlopeExpansion = vle::value::toDouble(events.get("P_SlopeExpansion"));
00052         P_SlopeSenescence = vle::value::toDouble(events.get("P_SlopeExpansion"));
00053         
00054         }
00055 
00056 
00057         virtual ~UnitLeafArea() {};
00058 
00059 
00060             virtual void compute(const vle::devs::Time& /*time*/)
00061         {
00062         //std::cout << "UnitLeafArea compute begin" << std::endl;
00063         // Vitesse de croissance
00064         // Teff * (PhytoSmax[i] * P_ke) * exp(-P_ke * (TT - PhytoTTExp[i])) / (1 + exp(-P_ke * (TT - PhytoTTExp[i])))^2
00065         RateAreaExpansion = TempEff() * (P_AreaMax * P_SlopeExpansion) * exp(-P_SlopeExpansion * (ThermalTime() - P_UnitTTExp)) / pow((1 + exp(-P_SlopeExpansion * (ThermalTime() - P_UnitTTExp))),2);
00066         
00067         // Vitesse de senescence (ne pas utiliser P_AreaMax si la taille finale n'est pas atteinte)
00068         RateAreaSenescence = TempEff() * (P_AreaMax * P_SlopeSenescence) * exp(-P_SlopeSenescence * (ThermalTime() - P_UnitTTSen)) / pow((1 + exp(-P_SlopeSenescence * (ThermalTime() - P_UnitTTSen))),2);
00069         
00070         // Surface totale : intégration de RateAreaExpansion
00071         AreaExpansion = AreaExpansion(-1) + RateAreaExpansion();
00072         
00073         // Surface senescente : intégration de RateAreaSenescence
00074         AreaSenescence = AreaSenescence(-1) + RateAreaSenescence();
00075         
00076         // Surface active : différence totale - senescence
00077         AreaActive = AreaExpansion() - AreaSenescence();
00078         }
00079 
00080             virtual void initValue(const vle::devs::Time& /* time */)
00081             {
00082         //std::cout << "UnitLeafArea init begin" << std::endl;
00083         RateAreaExpansion = 0.0;
00084         RateAreaSenescence = 0.0;
00085         AreaExpansion = 0.0;
00086         AreaSenescence = 0.0;
00087         AreaActive = 0.0;
00088         }
00089 
00090 
00091         private:
00092         //Variables d'etat
00093         Var RateAreaExpansion; 
00094         Var RateAreaSenescence; 
00095         Var AreaExpansion; 
00096         Var AreaSenescence; 
00097         Var AreaActive; 
00099         //Entrées
00100         Sync TempEff;
00101         Sync ThermalTime;
00102 
00103         //Parametres du modele
00104         // double P_Phyllochron; /**< Paramètre: Phyllochrone d'apparition des strates, Unite: degres.jours */
00105         double P_AreaMax; 
00106         double P_UnitTTExp; 
00107         double P_UnitTTSen; 
00108         double P_SlopeExpansion; 
00109         double P_SlopeSenescence; 
00110     };
00111 }
00112 DECLARE_NAMED_DYNAMICS(UnitLeafArea, Unit::UnitLeafArea); // balise specifique VLE
